content.text: Hi there. How is your day going?
It is going well. I am taking a break from skiing.
No, I just balance my busy schedule by taking classes in the morning, working in the afternoon, and skiing in the evening.
Cool. I am more comfortable in my casual clothes than in formal wear.
I like to dress up, but I also like to dress down.
I love Mac and cheese so much that I even named my favorite book after it! What is your favorite food?
I like sushi. I would love to have lunch with the creator of Thomas the Tank Engine, Wilbert Awdry, to thank him for bringing joy to my childhood.
I am Italian-American. I would love to have lunch with my grandfather and learn more about his childhood in Italy.
That would be cool. I read everything I could about my family history.
What are you studying in school?
I am studying to be a teacher
